one.achievements: Magician, hypnotist, 9-time world record holder, Founder & COO of Kerala School of Mentalism (KSM).
one.theme: Dark and mysterious, with gothic fonts, spiral patterns, and eerie visuals related to hypnosis and mentalism.

two.team_size: Each team can have between 3 to 6 members.

three.team_size: Each team can have between 2 to 5 members.
